    • Method Detail

      • initiateCheck

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> initiateCheck(java.lang.String fileContents)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        This method scrapes and extracts the data from the .map file into a hashmap of countries and continents. This method also checks the credibility of the .map file given as input and displays error messages if there are any
        Parameters:
        fileContents - contains the contents of the .map file in string format
        Returns:
        returns the continent,country hashmaps and also the error messages if the map has any errors otherwise returns success
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
